last_episode_to_air.name: Going Back to the Start
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the truth is finally brought to light, the experiment continues to take obscure turns, blurring the lines between what’s real and what’s planned.

name: Triptych
overview: After learning she was separated at birth from her two identical sisters, Rebecca embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the truth about her origins.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After finding out she is one of three identical triplets, a relentless detective embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the truth about her past.

episodes.name: 33 x 3
episodes.overview: A forensics agent meets a dying woman who inexplicably knows her name — Becca — and looks just like her. Their encounter unleashes a storm of unknowns.

episodes.name: Molotov Cocktail
episodes.overview: The DNA results force Becca’s mom to come clean. Becca finds puzzling photographs in Eugenio’s home, where her visions become more vivid than ever.

episodes.name: Olympia Mens' Club
episodes.overview: Becca meets with her sister Tamara, who always seems to know more than she shares. Humberto pledges to help Becca. Eugenio’s string of lies continues.

episodes.name: Am I Going Crazy?
episodes.overview: Humberto comes to Becca with new details and ends up seducing her. Under Eugenio’s tutelage, the transformation of Tamara into her sister Aleida begins.

episodes.name: Oil and Water
episodes.overview: The fake Aleida cedes control over her company to Eugenio. Becca challenges Dr. Bátiz. More incredible coincidences about the triplets' lives surface.

episodes.name: The Experiment
episodes.overview: Guided by a vision, Becca asks Pilar to give her access to the hospital’s basement. What she uncovers is devastating... as are its ripple effects.

episodes.name: The Hand That Rocks The Cradle
episodes.overview: With Beatriz dead and Tamara missing, Becca suspects Eugenio is now after her, and decides to entrust her mother's safety to Dr. Bátiz.

episodes.name: Going Back to the Start
episodes.overview: As the truth is finally brought to light, the experiment continues to take obscure turns, blurring the lines between what’s real and what’s planned.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After finding out she is one of three identical triplets, a relentless detective embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the truth about her past.
